entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
